physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Physical examination demonstrated extensive cicatricial alopecia involving the mid scalp, vertex, and superior occipital scalp. Numerous follicularly based erythematous hyperkeratotic papules were noted diffusely over the entire scalp. The eyebrows demonstrated erythema and sparse terminal hairs. Moderate facial erythema marked the cheeks and chin. Keratosis pilaris was exhibited on the extensor surfaces of the upper and lower extremities bilaterally. Follicular atrophoderma consisting of round, follicularly based depressions was noted on the dorsal aspects of the hands.
